idea-plugin.name: Sputnik
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• Handle split lines in program output, so that no command is missing
  • Ability to draw a chart using the 'c' command
idea-plugin.description:
Allows to debug programs with printf.
Parses program console output, detects lines in a special format, and builds a histogram shown in a dedicated tool window.
Commands have the format '0x01cmd(args)\n', i.e. byte 1 followed by a command name and command arguments in parentheses. In java one can print a command like this: System.out.println("\01h('Histogram name','bucket name')").
Supported commands:
h('histName','bucketName') - adds 1 to the bucket in the specified histogram
hr('histName') - resets the specified histogram

c('chartName','counterName') - adds 1 to the counter with the given name in the given chart

A lot of printing will slow down the program, so it is suitable only for quick experiments.
